events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because this is not what I paid for.
The issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request regarding incorrect product delivery.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah Johnson who specializes in refund cases for further handling.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I understand you want a refund for your order, and I'm here to help.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number so I can verify the issue?
I have attached the photo showing the wrong item and the order confirmation. Please process my refund as soon as possible.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund immediately and send you a confirmation email within 24 hours.
Thank you for the quick response and for processing my refund. I appreciate the help and quick resolution.
The refund has been processed successfully. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
We are following up to confirm that your refund was received and to see if you need any further assistance.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing your case. Please contact us if you need further help.
